item.title: Build your own Static Code Analysis tool in .NET by knowing how Assembly, Type, MethodInfo, ParameterInfo work.
item.description: Why buy a whole tool when you can build your own? Learn how the Type system works in .NET, and create your own minimal type analyser. Link to article: https://www.code4it.dev/blog/assembly-type-methodinfo-parameterinfo/
